title: Arkansas Post National Memorial: Park Statistics
body: Park Statistics       Acreage Gross Area Acres for FY 2009 - 758 Gross Area Acres for FY 2008 - 758 Gross Area Acres for FY 2007 - 758  Visitation Total Recreation Visits for FY 2009- 38,095 Total Recreation Visits for FY 2008- 43,598 Total Recreation Visits for FY 2007- 40,093 Budget FY 2009 Annual Budget is $836,262 FY 2008 Annual Budget is $740,840 FY 2007 Annual Budget is $731,951
